## R Markdown

This markdown file utilizes multiple binary logistic regression, using "rejected" as a reference angle

```{r data, include=FALSE}
# Load data
ucb <- as.data.frame(UCBAdmissions)
head(ucb)
```

## Estimate odds ratio and 95% confidence interval for predictor variables, relative to the reference variable ("Rejected")

```{r logistic}
# Example: Multiple Binary Logistic Regression
model1 <- glm(Admit ~ Gender + Dept, family = binomial, data = ucb, weights = Freq)
summary(model1)
exp(cbind(OR = coef(model1), confint.default(model1)))
```
